root.name: Klomanager - Spül mir das Lied vom Kot
root.description: The goal of the game is to management six lots of toilets and earn more money than your rivals. You can upgrade your toilets with different toilet seats, toilet papers, soaps and condom dispensers. Depending on the quality, cleanliness and price of your toilets you get more visitors and of course more money. You can also boost money via three advertisement campaigns. Up to four players can play against each other and this is where the dirty tactics come in. Sabotage your enemies toilets or send in a health inspector.
